story:
Tuff Cuff Records, and The Moonah Arts Collective combine to present My Left Boot, recorded, and filmed by the experienced audio, and video professionals of The Moonah Arts Collective and JK Productions.

The Moonah Arts Collective is a community based Arts Organisation on the Southern Mornington Peninsula, offering a rehearsal, recording, and event space. They are dedicated to progressing, promoting, and empowering music, and other arts , with a strong focus on developing local content.

Tuff Cuff Records is a Record Label and Record Club created by Record Collectors for Record Collectors. Focussing on Limited Edition runs of Australian Musicians.

Grafting together the sounds of 1970s fuzz rock, ‘60s psychedelia and a health dose of flat-out howling vocals, My Left Boot have been blowing away audiences since 2005.
Their first album, Summer Songs is nine tracks of awesomeness that bottles the band’s rock, blues, fuzz and stoner influences. It captures a band that has been slogging it out live for the best part of 15 years, with inspired songwriting and a huge sonic delivery.
The band has played at the most loved venues and festivals across the the continent, sharing stages with countless amazing bands, and it shows. The Boot’s live show is a formidable beast of a thing. Huge blues-soaked riffs, old school hideously powerful rhythm section topped with what must be one of the most jaw dropping vocals in the land. Seriously!

Moonah Arts Collectives mission is to document, and champion Victorias music scene, by capturing local musicians with high quality vision, and sound, and sharing it globally through The Moonah Arts Collective Youtube Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCrJGtAQxzhxJbM... other avenues.


We hope by making, and releasing these videos to the world, that we can help find, and build markets for local acts, Our goal is to make our Youtube channel the go-to online destination to rummage through modern Victorian music.


Our first series of videos from Rye locals Stiff Richards was gobbled up by fans on release, with over 60% of views occurring outside Australia


Check out our video of Stiff Richards live: https://youtu.be/cE4xGsq8diU
Our second series of videos was Victorian Rock Legends “Warped”, recorded Live at our studio at

The Moonah Arts Collective back in early June.
Check out our video of Warped live: https://youtu.be/OiAWvaf8cbE


To continue our mission of producing these videos we need to cover our costs, and reward the musical acts. So we are launching our first Indiegogo campaign to help us raise the money to produce these video performances. We hope you can help us out by participating.
Our production costs for this videos is $800AUD. $400 goes to Venue and Audio, $400 goes to video production, $600 goes to My Left Boot. After goodies, Indiegogo platform fees, and charges, that makes $1915.00 for the entire campaign.


We are looking for contributors to help us in our mission to document our local music culture.
Contributors will have their name in the credits for our live music video. They will be supporting local music, and will help us in creating a document of our music scene in the present moment that will last as long as the internet, accessible to a global audience, and you can share it with your friends.
With our larger “Sponsorship” level offer we offer a full screen super displaying your name, or your companies name, and logo.

Here are our perks:

$20: Credit & Tuff Cuff Records Gift Pack (sml)
We will include your name in the credits for our live music video.
You will also receive a Tuff Cuff Records Pack including a Badge, Sticker and Guitar Pick.

$40: Credit & Tuff Cuff Records Gift Pack (mid)
We will include your name in the credits for our live music video.
You will also receive a Tuff Cuff Records Pack including a Badge, Sticker and Guitar Pick.
 
$100: Credit & Tuff Cuff Records Gift Pack (large) & Ticket
We will include your name at the top of the credits for our live music video.
And you will Receive a Medium Tuff Cuff Records Pack including a 7” Record from their archives, Badge, Sticker and Guitar Pick. 
You are also invited to attend the recording of the performance (covid restrictions allowing).
 
$200: Sponsorship & Tuff Cuff Records Gift Pack (deluxe) & Ticket
We will give you your own full Screen super at the beginning or end of the music video.
And you will Receive a Tuff Cuff Records Pack including a T-Shirt, 7” from previous Tuff Cuff releases, a Badge, Sticker and Guitar Pick 
You are also invited to attend the recording of the performance (covid restrictions allowing).
 
In the unfortunate event that we fail to meet our minimum, you will not be charged.

story:
"Tribulations" Summary-

Help us fund our first studio album!
  • Lords Of Normal is an alternative rock band located in Joplin Missouri with a love for the roots of music, a love for challenging, groovy, rhythmic, catchy music and a passion for writing, playing and performance. "Tribulations" is our first studio album. Produced in Arizona with Card Table Studios, "Tribulations" is an electrifying, daring, funk rock opera, story based crusade that was made to capture an audience within the first minute of the album.
  • We need help from you to fund the album and help us with the costs for mixing, mastering, and packaging for the album. We want the best product for everyone and we couldn't do it without your help!
  • With this album, we are hoping it will lead us to more shows including different venues, festivals, competitions, and even labels, press, blogs, etc. 

We love our fans and really want everyone to hear this album.  Your help is highly appreciated!

What We Need & What You Get

  • We will need a total of 1600 dollars to mix, master, and package our album, "Tribulations."
  • Some of our unique perks are- If you give us 400 or more dollars, we will take you out for a dinner of your choosing on us, you will get a free t-shirt, poster, CD, Stickers, and a Cake with your choice of flavor.
  • If we don't reach our entire goal, the funds will still be going to the album, and we will work our hardest to pay off the rest in due time. 
  • The Impact
  • We have poured hours of time, blood, sweat, and tears into this album. We have spent around a year working about five days a week on writing the album, and fitting the correct pieces together to try to give exactly what we thought you guys would want. With your money, our dreams would literally come true, and you would make our songs come to life.
  • We love you guys, and have no hard feelings either way. Anything you could give we would highly appreciate. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you give money, or can't give anything at all, PLEASE SHARE THIS PAGE and tell people about this! We need this to spread as much as it can.
  • Use the Indie go go share tools. They come in handy. Also help us out just by liking our Facebook page, follow us on Twitter and Instagram, and keep in touch!

story:
Help me to raise some money to make my new studio album, promote it and commercialize it.

Blessings! 

My name is Luis Fernando, I'm a musician, producer and singer from Medellin, Colombia, South America. Since I was little my life was sorrounded by music, my grandfather played guitar, my grandmother was an amazing singer, and my parents met at a Colombian band called "Los hermanos Martelo", Eventhough I never met my father I was always conected to music, and started playing the flute, guitar and congas when I was 8 years old.

On december 24th, an important holyday in Colombia, my mother, my brother and I were going to the church and a taxi ran into us, killing my mother rigth away, and leaving me on a coma for more than a month, My brother was miraculously safe; but this accident left me, with only 13 years old, in charge of my brother and myself. 
From that day untill today, we've been working hard to raise, change our history and enlarge our talents to be able to help others through music.
With your help I can reach youngsters with a positive message about God, helping them to leave drugs, alcohol, and get a closer relationship with JesusChrist.


What we need and what you get.

I need $25.000 USD in 40 days, to pay the studio, 10 songs, mixing, mastering,  5 video recording, cd copies, web marketing (including media management, web page and online broadcasting) and advertising (4 promoters, 1 manager, in Colombia you have to pay to sound on the radio "pay off law" which is legal).
You can get from a "Thank you!" note on your email to a guided tour in Medellin, Colombia.
We are going to pray for everyone who contributes or help us sharing as a way to thank all the love… but this is for free! Is just love.
If i don't get all the money, I'll record an EP; But if I get some extra money, I'm planning to record a LIVE DVD with the full album and videos. 

The impact.

Colombia is going through its best moment to achieve peace; my music will contribute, with God's message, to improve the coexistence in our society, it will help youngsters to change their minds and find new ways to live, create and progress. 

With my last recording, I got to play in various concerts and festivals in Colombia, Like "Gospel Park" (Medellin)  2007, 2009, 2013; "Rock al parque" (Bogota) 2000, 2001, 2002; "Festival Altavoz" (Medellin) 2009, 2011, 2012, 2013; and many more. And the best parts is that many youngsters on this events decided to follow Jesus and change their lifestyles.


Don't worry if you can't donate!

If this project touches you and you'd like to help me, but you can't donate, please share this with as many people as you can: family, friends, coworkers, boss, business men(women) or everyone intersted in supporting me. That will be very HELPFUL!

Also a pray for us will always be a blessing.

Share it on Facebook, Twitter, Newspapers,  Everywhere… All the help is important and valuable.
story_txt:
Help me to raise some money to make my new studio album, promote it and commercialize it.
Blessings! 
My name is Luis Fernando, I'm a musician, producer and singer from Medellin, Colombia, South America. Since I was little my life was sorrounded by music, my grandfather played guitar, my grandmother was an amazing singer, and my parents met at a Colombian band called "Los hermanos Martelo", Eventhough I never met my father I was always conected to music, and started playing the flute, guitar and congas when I was 8 years old.
On december 24th, an important holyday in Colombia, my mother, my brother and I were going to the church and a taxi ran into us, killing my mother rigth away, and leaving me on a coma for more than a month, My brother was miraculously safe; but this accident left me, with only 13 years old, in charge of my brother and myself. 
From that day untill today, we've been working hard to raise, change our history and enlarge our talents to be able to help others through music.
With your help I can reach youngsters with a positive message about God, helping them to leave drugs, alcohol, and get a closer relationship with JesusChrist.   
What we need and what you get.

I need $25.000 USD in 40 days, to pay the studio, 10 songs, mixing, mastering,  5 video recording, cd copies, web marketing (including media management, web page and online broadcasting) and advertising (4 promoters, 1 manager, in Colombia you have to pay to sound on the radio "pay off law" which is legal).

You can get from a "Thank you!" note on your email to a guided tour in Medellin, Colombia.
We are going to pray for everyone who contributes or help us sharing as a way to thank all the love… but this is for free! Is just love.
If i don't get all the money, I'll record an EP; But if I get some extra money, I'm planning to record a LIVE DVD with the full album and videos. 

The impact.
 Colombia is going through its best moment to achieve peace; my music will contribute, with God's message, to improve the coexistence in our society, it will help youngsters to change their minds and find new ways to live, create and progress. 
With my last recording, I got to play in various concerts and festivals in Colombia, Like "Gospel Park" (Medellin)  2007, 2009, 2013; "Rock al parque" (Bogota) 2000, 2001, 2002; "Festival Altavoz" (Medellin) 2009, 2011, 2012, 2013; and many more. story:
Short Summary

My name is Sterling Koch and I am looking to raise funds to release my latest album in CD format and properly promote and market it. The album is already finished and WILL be released in mp3 format but I am also looking to release it on CD as the demographic of my music still likes to purchase their music on CD. I would also like to raise funds for advertising (print ad) and music promotion (hire a promoter to work the album at radio and magazine).

What We Need & What You Get

I am looking to raise $6,000.00 for this project. The first $2,000.00 would go toward manufacturing 1,500 CDs of which 500 would be used as promotional copies. The next $1,500.00 would be used for print advertising in blues music magazines. The final $2,500.00 would be used to hire a nationally known and recognized music promoter experienced in promoting blues music to help make the new album reach to as many fans as possible and have it's fullest impact.

The Impact

By purchasing advertising and hiring a music promoter I am looking to have this album have the fullest impact possible. I have experience with the purchasing of print ads and working with a record promoter on previous releases of mine. This will be my 6th album release. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please get the word out to others and make some noise about this campaign.
  • Feel free to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Fundraising proceeds will benefit the Bnai Zion Medical Center situated in battle stricken Northern Israel. Money raised will go towards construction of a new state of the art underground facility, fortified against nuclear, ballistic, biological and chemical attack. The sole purpose of this facility will be preserving safety and life for the innocent Christian, Muslim, Baha’i and Jewish men, women and children of Haifa. 

OUR MISSION

Kol Ahava, which translates to “all love” in Hebrew, is comprised of a group of young, diverse professionals with a single united goal: fundraising for worthy causes through local, exciting, and unique events. Our fundraising efforts focus on providing for the indigent, sick, and less fortunate with a particular emphasis on children.

Kol Ahava has had incredible and unprecedented results. As we continue to grow, we have formed incredible bonds and relationships with corporate and small business partners that share our mission and goals. Although we have been incredibly inspired by our success, we continue to strive for larger and more successful events with an ultimate goal of making a difference for disadvantaged children across the globe.

story:
Viele Jahre habe ich Eurythmieunterricht gegeben. Dabei geht es um Bewegung zum Wort und zur Musik. Ich habe selber mit Kollegen Kammermusik gespielt und Konzerte gegeben. Auch mit Schülern habe ich klassiche Werke wie Streichquartette, -quintette und anderes erarbeitet und aufgeführt. Vor allem habe ich jahrelang mit dem großen Orchester der Schule gearbeitet, Konzerte gegeben und Reisen unternommen.
Die Begegnung mit dem Publikum, das Wahrnehmen der Menschen, die musizieren und das unmittelbare Erleben der Musik in dem einzigartigen Moment, wenn sie entsteht, ist mir immer wichtiger geworden.
Ich will Konzerte veranstalten an Orten, wo kaum klassische Musik zu hören ist. Dabei sollen junge Musiker die Gelegenheit bekommen, als Solisten mit dem Orchester aufzutreten oder im Orchester mit zu spielen.
Da ich nur kurze Probenzeiten habe, brauche ich erfahrene Musiker, die die verschiedenen Grupen im Orchester führen. Diese brauchen ein Honorar. Da ich die Kosten für die Musiker, das Notenmaterial, die Werbung usw. zumindest vorläufig nicht durch die Konzerteinnahmen decken kann, starte ich diese Kampange, um die Mittel dafür einzuwerben.
Ich brauche ca. € 3.000,-
Erreiche ich nicht die ganze Summe, werde ich die Musiker bitten, dieses Mal mit weniger Honorar zufrieden zu sein. Denn das Konzert muss stattfinden! Ich bin aber zuversichtlich, dass ich diese Summe einwerben kann!
Bitte unterstütze diese pädagogische und volkspädagogische Initiative!
Die Spenden gehen an den gemeinnützigen Verein "bewegen und gestalten e.V.", der auch der Veranstalter sein wird.
